title: Emoji wallpapers

if you are looking to style up your phone’s screen lockers and to protect your precious phone from intruders, look no more we’ve got that covered, this girly app is just what every teen girl  and stylish girls needs to protect her privacy and we included tons of awesome girly emoji wallpapers.

Whether it's a sassy emoji or Galaxy poop emoji , fish, fruit, flags, or frogs or any aesthetic emoji or vaporwave or any cute emoji and poop emoji, simply choose in a list of emojis and watch your emoji wallpapers come to life.
There is no limit on the number of emojis that you can add.
You can also change the size of the emojis and emoji background image. Whether it's a Girly wallpaper so that you can make your emoji wallpapers and emoji backgrounds truly unique and you can also add your text to better express yourself.
this app is designed for teen girl who love teen wallpapers and emoji backgrounds and cute emoji wallpapers.
